json.text:
This Mark from MarkTeacher.com with an
IELTS speaking test question and answer.

This high band example answer is about
happiness. How would you define happiness?

Happiness is quite a difficult
concept to define, but I think for most

people it's being surrounded by friends
and loved ones. having a really tight

circle of friends - a group of friends
that you can really rely on, I think, is

very important to people's happiness.
Having someone to support you if you're

going through a tough time can make a
big difference to your overall
well-being and your outlook on life. Also for some people, being

comfortable in your own skin is a very
important step towards happiness. Being

comfortable with your body, your
appearance, the way you sound, the way you

act, your habits - I think when people feel
comfortable with those attributes they

can start to feel happier overall. Those
are probably the two most common

definitions that I've heard for
happiness. Check out MarkTeacher.com for
more IELTS courses lessons and tips.
